text: Ara se samayera katha smarana kara, yakhana tomara palanakarta sambada diyechena ye, abasya'i keyamata dibasa paryanta ihudidera upara emana loka pathate thakabena yara taderake nikrsta sasti dana karate thakabe. Nihsandehe tomara palanakarta sighra sasti danakari ebam tini ksamasila, dayalu.
